name: Xmas Santa Mad Sleigh Run
summary:
The fastest Santa Sleigh ride on earth! Slide down the mountain and avoid the trees!
X-mas Santa Mad Sleigh Run, is an easy to play arcade game.
Just drag your finger left and right to move Santa.
Watch-out for the Trees, Snowman and huge Candy Cane
as you slide down the mountain.
Start slow and build speed as you go down the mountain
until you get almost supersonic!
With one hand, one thumb controls, this game is
easy to play, fun to master!
If you're looking for free Christmas
fun games you've just found it!
Have fun this Christmas holiday season:
Get it now!
